thread.title: Will Smith is getting jiggy with music again with Latin band
thread.title_full: Will Smith is getting jiggy with music again with Latin band

title: Will Smith is getting jiggy with music again with Latin band
text: > Entertainment Will Smith is getting jiggy with music again with Latin band In this Sept. 17, 2015 photo released by Sony Music, members of Bomba Estereo, from left, Simon Mejia, Julian Salazar, Andres Zea and Liliana Saumet pose for a selfie with actor-singer Will Smith, who appears on a remix to Colombian band Bomba Estereo’s song, “Fiesta.” The remix was released digitally Friday, Oct. 2. The collaboration marks Smith’s return to music since his 2005 album, “Lost and Found.” Smith discovered Bomba Estereo, known for its blend of Latin, tropical and electro sounds, on a recent trip to Colombia. He then asked the group to collaborate. (Alan Silfen/Sony via AP)
